column4: can anyone point me to a guide that will make compiz work on a mobility 9000 card in gusty?  I had it working fine with feisty but gusty broke it and i can't find a fix.
can anyone point me to a guide that will make compiz work on a mobility 9000 card in gusty?  I had it working fine with feisty but gusty broke it and i can't find a fix.
you trying to run fglrx with your mobility 9000?
fglrx dropped support for that card a long time ago, old card
